articles.title: Vaughan Gething to become Welsh first minister and Europe’s first Black leader - CNN
articles.description: Vaughan Gething won the Welsh Labour Party leadership contest on Saturday, meaning he will become the first Black leader of the semi-autonomous government in Wales.
articles.content:
Vaughan Gething won the Welsh Labour Party leadership contest on Saturday, meaning he will become the first Black leader of the semi-autonomous government in Wales.
Today, we turn a page in the book… [+1414 chars]
